derivation.yuyuan_name: from Old French, from Latin Francorum Rex 'king of the Franks', the legend on gold coins struck in the 14th cent. in the reign of Jean le Bon

entry.tran: 法郎(法国和比利时使用欧元前的货币单位，也是其他一些讲法语国家的货币单位)
entry.def: The franc was the unit of currency that was used in France and Belgium, before it was replaced by the euro. It is also the unit of currency in some other countries where French is spoken.

example.ex: The price of grapes had shot up to 32 francs a kilo.
example.tran: 葡萄价格大幅上涨，达到每公斤 32 法郎。

means.word_mean: 1. the basic monetary unit in many countries; equal to 100 centimes

sentences.en: A surcharge of 40 francs was added to our bill.
sentences.cn: 我们的账单上加了40 法郎的附加费。

sentences.en: For fifteen francs a month she found a tiny six-floor room.
sentences.cn: 她找到了一个6层楼极小的房间,每月15法郎。
